question: The system used for rubbish/garbage collection in your local area is not working properly. This is causing problems for you and your neighbours. Write a letter to the local council. In your letter:– Describe how the rubbish collection system is not working properly– Explain how this is affecting you and your neighbours– Suggest what should be done about the problem
text: I am writing to inform you that the litter gathering system of our area 10S Smith Block is out of order.

Additionally, It has come to my notice that there is no proper disposal carrying vehicles in our area. Whereas, no trash sorting activities are being practised or promoted. There are also no garbage tins or dustbins  present along the streets and roads and all the surplus material can be seen scattered everywhere.Therefore, all the locality is in serious mental and physical ordeal as no passer-by bypasses but gets into trouble because of the trash in the streets.
I have some suggestions to improve these heinous circumstances which I would like to put forth.

A full-time working department is much needed for waste disposal. Encouragement of conventional ways of garbage management  should be done through awareness campaigns. In addition, there should be fixed timings for the collection and transport of debris daily.
I shall be looking forward to seeing these measures  implemented with full spirit.
